languages.text: {n}Историк тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Сейчас я начну изливать душу, и через десять минут вы исчезнете, как все предыдущие мои собеседники. Но ладно. Вот вам история Гордея Скатова, самого неудачливого историка в {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуме{/g}".

{n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Историк тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Сейчас я начну изливать душу, и через десять минут вы исчезнете, как все предыдущие мои собеседники. Но ладно. Вот вам история Гордея Скатова, самого неудачливого историка в {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуме{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the Imperium."

{n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the Imperium."

{n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the Imperium."

{n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the Imperium."

{n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

languages.text: {n}ゴルデイは大きくため息をついた。{/n}「どうせ話しても他の人たちみたいにすぐに呆れて離れていくんでしょう。でも、いいですよ。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}でもっとも不運な史学者、ゴルデイ・スカトフの話をどうぞお聞きください」
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ゴルデイは大きくため息をついた。{/n}「どうせ話しても他の人たちみたいにすぐに呆れて離れていくんでしょう。でも、いいですよ。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}でもっとも不運な史学者、ゴルデイ・スカトフの話をどうぞお聞きください」

languages.text: {n}戈尔代沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“那我就再说一遍吧，把我的一切都告诉您。您也可以像之前那些人一样，听我唠叨十分钟之后一走了之。不过，没关系，让我讲讲戈尔代·斯卡托夫的故事吧，他是整个{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}最不幸的历史学家。”
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}戈尔代沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“那我就再说一遍吧，把我的一切都告诉您。您也可以像之前那些人一样，听我唠叨十分钟之后一走了之。不过，没关系，让我讲讲戈尔代·斯卡托夫的故事吧，他是整个{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}最不幸的历史学家。”

languages.text: {n}Gordei suspira con pesar.{/n} «Allá vamos otra vez, abriéndome en canal para que luego usted desaparezca a los diez minutos como todos los demás. {mf|Tranquilo|Tranquila}, no pasa nada; esta es la historia de Gordei Skatov, el historiador con peor suerte de todo el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei suspira con pesar.{/n} «Allá vamos otra vez, abriéndome en canal para que luego usted desaparezca a los diez minutos como todos los demás. {mf|Tranquilo|Tranquila}, no pasa nada; esta es la historia de Gordei Skatov, el historiador con peor suerte de todo el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».

languages.text: {n}Gordei pousse un profond soupir.{/n} « Et voilà... Je vais encore m'épancher et vous allez partir au bout de dix minutes, comme tous les autres avant vous. Mais soit, je vais vous conter l'histoire de Gordei Skatov, l'historien le plus malchanceux de tout l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei pousse un profond soupir.{/n} « Et voilà... Je vais encore m'épancher et vous allez partir au bout de dix minutes, comme tous les autres avant vous. Mais soit, je vais vous conter l'histoire de Gordei Skatov, l'historien le plus malchanceux de tout l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Gordei seufzt tief.{/n} "Und schon wieder schütte ich mein Herz aus, und Ihr werdet in zehn Minuten weg sein wie alle anderen vor Euch. Aber gut. So hört denn die Geschichte von Gordei Skatov, dem glücklosesten Historiker des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei seufzt tief.{/n} "Und schon wieder schütte ich mein Herz aus, und Ihr werdet in zehn Minuten weg sein wie alle anderen vor Euch. Aber gut. So hört denn die Geschichte von Gordei Skatov, dem glücklosesten Historiker des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}."

languages.text: {n}Gordei, derinden iç çekiyor.{/n} "Bak işte, yine her önüme gelene içimi dökmeye başladım, sanki daha önce gelenler de hemen tüymek için bahane aramamış gibi. Neyse, sorun değil. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} en bahtsız tarihçisi Gordei Skatov'un hikâyesini anlatayım size."
languages.original_text: {n}Gordei sighs heavily.{/n} "Here I go again, pouring my heart out to have you disappear in ten minutes just like everyone else before you. But all right. Here is the story of Gordei Skatov, the unluckiest historian in the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordei, derinden iç çekiyor.{/n} "Bak işte, yine her önüme gelene içimi dökmeye başladım, sanki daha önce gelenler de hemen tüymek için bahane aramamış gibi. Neyse, sorun değil. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un en bahtsız tarihçisi Gordei Skatov'un hikâyesini anlatayım size."
